Title: Articles of Incorporation
Writer: Matteo Borghese, Rob Turbovsky, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by), Carson Mell (story editor)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: The guys find themselves in trouble with their company name when they find out it's already taken. So whilst Richard tries to find a solution, Erlich searches for a new name in another dimension of his consciousness.
